card.question: Under the shared responsibility model, which of the following is the customer responsible for?
choices: Ensuring that disk drives are wiped after use.
Ensuring that firmware is updated on hardware devices.
Ensuring that data is encrypted at rest.
Ensuring that network cables are category six or higher.
card.answer: Ensuring that data is encrypted at rest.

Which service stores objects, provides real-time access to those objects, and offers versioning and lifecycle capabilities?
Which AWS Support plan provides a full set of AWS Trusted Advisor checks?

What time-savings advantage is offered with the use of Amazon Recognition?
choices: Amazon Rekognition provides automatic watermarking of images.
Amazon Rekognition provides automatic detection of objects appearing in pictures.
Amazon Rekognition provides the ability to resize millions of images automatically.
Amazon Rekognition uses Amazon Mechanical Turk to allow humans to bid on object detection jobs.
card.answer: Amazon Rekognition provides automatic detection of objects appearing in pictures.

card.question: When comparing AWS with on-premises Total Cost of Ownership (TCO), what costs are included?

Which AWS tool will identify security groups that grant unrestricted Internet access to a limited list of ports?
Which AWS service can be used to generate alerts based on an estimated monthly bill?
Which Amazon EC2 pricing model offers the MOST significant discount when compared to On-Demand Instances?
choices: Partial Upfront Reserved Instances for a 1-year term
All Upfront Reserved Instances for a 1-year term
All Upfront Reserved Instances for a 3-year term
No Upfront Reserved Instances for a 3-year term
card.answer: All Upfront Reserved Instances for a 3-year term

card.question: Which of the following is the responsibility of AWS?
choices: Setting up AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM) users and groups
Physically destroying storage media at end of life
Configuring security settings on Amazon EC2 instances
card.answer: Physically destroying storage media at end of life

card.question: Which of the following is an advantage of using AWS?
choices: There is no guessing on capacity needs.
card.answer: There is no guessing on capacity needs.

Which services manage and automate application deployments on AWS?

choices: AWS Total Cost of Ownership (TCO) Calculator

card.question: Which principles are used to architect applications for reliability on the AWS Cloud?
choices: Test for moderate demand to ensure reliability
Backup recovery to an on-premises environment

card.question: Which principles are used to architect applications for reliability on the AWS Cloud?
choices: Test for moderate demand to ensure reliability
Backup recovery to an on-premises environment

card.question: What tasks should a customer perform when that customer suspects an AWS account has been compromised?
choices: Move resources to a different AWS Region.

card.question: What tasks should a customer perform when that customer suspects an AWS account has been compromised?
choices: Move resources to a different AWS Region.

card.question: What is an example of high availability in the AWS Cloud?
choices: Consulting AWS technical support at any time day or night
Ensuring an application remains accessible, even if a resource fails
Making any AWS service available for use by paying on demand
Deploying in any part of the world using AWS Regions
card.answer: Ensuring an application remains accessible, even if a resource fails

card.question: Which AWS security service protects applications from distributed denial of service attacks with always-on detection and automatic inline mitigations?
A company wants to monitor the CPU usage of its Amazon EC2 resources. Which AWS service should the company use?
What is an AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM) role?
choices: A user associated with an AWS resource
A group associated with an AWS resource
An entity that defines a set of permissions for use with an AWS resource
An authentication credential associated with a multi-factor authentication (MFA) token
card.answer: An entity that defines a set of permissions for use with an AWS resource

card.question: What are the advantages of Reserved Instances?
choices: They provide a discount over on-demand pricing.
They provide access to additional instance types.
Customers can upgrade instances as new types become available.
card.answer: They provide a discount over on-demand pricing.

card.question: What are the advantages of Reserved Instances?
choices: Customers can reserve capacity in an Availability Zone.
They provide access to additional instance types.
Customers can upgrade instances as new types become available.
card.answer: Customers can reserve capacity in an Availability Zone.

card.question: How do Amazon EC2 Auto Scaling groups help achieve high availability for a web application?
choices: They automatically add more instances across multiple AWS Regions based on global demand of the application.
They automatically add or replace instances across multiple Availability Zones when the application needs it.
They enable the application's static content to reside closer to end users.
They are able to distribute incoming requests across a tier of web server instances.
card.answer: They automatically add or replace instances across multiple Availability Zones when the application needs it.

card.question: How can one AWS account use Reserved Instances from another AWS account?
choices: By using Amazon EC2 Dedicated Instances
By using AWS Organizations consolidated billing
By using the AWS Cost Explorer tool
card.answer: By using AWS Organizations consolidated billing

card.question: What is the value of using third-party software from AWS Marketplace instead of installing third-party software on Amazon EC2?
choices: Users pay for software by the hour or month depending on licensing.
AWS Marketplace data encryption is managed by a third-party vendor.
AWS Marketplace eliminates the need to upgrade to newer software versions.
Users can deploy third-party software without testing.
card.answer: Users pay for software by the hour or month depending on licensing.

card.question: What is the value of using third-party software from AWS Marketplace instead of installing third-party software on Amazon EC2?
choices: AWS Marketplace enables the user to launch applications with 1-Click.
AWS Marketplace data encryption is managed by a third-party vendor.
AWS Marketplace eliminates the need to upgrade to newer software versions.
Users can deploy third-party software without testing.
card.answer: AWS Marketplace enables the user to launch applications with 1-Click.

According to the AWS shared responsibility model, who is responsible for configuration management?
choices: It is solely the responsibility of the customer.
It is solely the responsibility of AWS.
It is shared between AWS and the customer.
It is not part of the AWS shared responsibility model.
card.answer: It is shared between AWS and the customer.

choices: AWS manages all security in the cloud.
Users have access to free and unlimited storage.
Users have control over the physical infrastructure.

card.question: Which of the following are benefits of hosting infrastructure in the AWS Cloud?
choices: Users have the ability to provision resources on demand.
AWS manages all security in the cloud.
Users have access to free and unlimited storage.
Users have control over the physical infrastructure.
card.answer: Users have the ability to provision resources on demand.

card.question: What AWS service would be used to centrally manage AWS access policies across multiple accounts?
What is AWS Trusted Advisor?
choices: It is an AWS staff member who provides recommendations and best practices on how to use AWS.
It is a network of AWS partners who provide recommendations and best practices on how to use AWS.
It is an online tool with a set of automated checks that provides recommendations on cost optimization, performance, and security.
It is another name for AWS Technical Account Managers who provide recommendations on cost optimization, performance, and security.
card.answer: It is an online tool with a set of automated checks that provides recommendations on cost optimization, performance, and security.

Create one IAM user and share with many developers and users.
